content:
DAV Property URL Scheme - Namespace (Cont’d)

  • Translation

    • Encase the URL in “(“ and “)” and turn all “/” to “!”. Any “!” will have to be URL encoded.
    • So the http://www.ietf.org/standards/dav/source property on http://foo now reads: http://foo;DAV/(http:!!www.ietf.org!standards!dav!source).
    • The parens are not necessary if the name does not contain slashes but MUST be used if the scheme begins with a “(“.
